instruction: take the phone conversation in the movie Taken that Bryan Mills has with his daughters captors, and rewrite it in old english
output:
Bryan Mills: "Hail, thou who hast taken my daughter. I am Bryan Mills, a retired CIA operative. I have come to retrieve her, and I will not stop until she is safe in my arms. If thou harmest her in any way, I will hunt thee down and make thee pay. Thou hast until dawn to release her unharmed, or I will come for thee with all the fury of a thousand suns."

Captor: "Nay, Bryan Mills, thou art not in a position to make threats. Thy daughter is in my possession, and I will do with her as I please. Thou art but a man, and I have the upper hand. Thou hast no idea the depths of my power and influence."

Bryan Mills: "Thou art mistaken, captor. I have faced far greater foes than thou, and I have emerged victorious every time. I will not be intimidated by thy empty words. I will find my daughter, and I will bring her home. Thou hast until dawn to release her unharmed, or I will come for thee with all the fury of a thousand suns."

Captor: "Thou art a fool, Bryan Mills. Thou dost not understand the gravity of the situation. Thy daughter is in my hands, and I will not let her go easily. Thou hast until dawn to reconsider thy position, or I will make sure thou dost not leave this place alive."
